items.content_html: A lightweight extension for Chromium-based browsers (Chrome, Edge) that redirects link navigations from any window to a user-defined target window. Redirection is automatic and works across tabs and sites, offering a single-window browsing flow.

items.content_html: doubles_cles is a lightweight web application that allows users to book appointments for car key duplication services in multiple locations. The site is built with React (frontend) and FastAPI (backend), and uses SQLite for local data storage. There is no payment or messaging system ‚Äî appointment confirmations are handled via email redirects.

The site is built with React (frontend) and FastAPI (backend), and uses SQLite for local data storage. There is no payment or messaging system ‚Äî appointment confirmations are handled via email redirects.

items.content_html: EasyTracker ‚Äì Smart Time Tracking & Project Management for Freelancers A lightweight and intuitive web app for tracking work sessions, managing clients and projects, setting custom tags, receiving smart reminders (including SMS), and generating detailed reports. items.content_html: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
items.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
